original: 建基西北，討伐羌族有功。誅殺十常侍，領兵入洛陽，後廢少帝、立獻帝，專斷朝政，引關東諸軍群起討伐。
text: Established a foundation in the Northwest, and made meritorious actions against the Qiang. He killed the ten permanent attendants, led the troops into Luoyang, then abolished the young emperor, established the emperor, arbitrarily ruled the government, and led the Kwantung army to crusade.
